kolaputti： kolaputti（na）
ကောလပုတ္တိ（န）
[kulaputta+ṇiya]
[ကုလပုတ္တ+ဏိယ]

Kolaputti，at A．I，38 is composition form of kulaputta，and is to be combined with the foll．--vaṇṇa-pokkharatā，i．e．light colour as becoming a man of good family．Kern，Toev．s．v．quite unnecessarily interprets it as “heroncolour，” comparing Sk．kolapuccha heron．A similar passage at Nd1 80=Nd2 505 reads kolaputtikena vā vaṇṇapokkharatāya vā，thus taking kolaputtikaṁ as nt，meaning a man of good virtue．The A passage may be corrupt and should then be read °puttikaṁ．（Page 229）

kolaputti：ကောလပုတ္တိ （န）
[ကုလပုတ္တ+ဏိယ]
အမျိုးကောင်းသား၏ အဖြစ်။
